entry.title: Flow Paws - Natural rubber extreme grip yoga mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Mat
Price: 155.00

For when you feel lost at sea … we bring you FLOW. A first of its kind, Yogi Bare innovation. After nearly two years of testing, we have managed to create a photographic print on eco-conscious high-performance rubber.

Description

Of course we had to bring the ocean to life on our latest creation. We hope that FLOW serves as a reminder to your infinite depth and wonder, that even when the surface gets a little rough, changeable and choppy you remember that under the sea there is a whole beautiful world that still exists and still lives on, just as with ourselves.

We believe in the healing power and perspective of the ocean which is why FLOW goes beyond just a mat.

Each mat comes with a digital download of our Exclusive Yogi Bare Magazine – Ride The Wave. A mental health toolkit full of interviews, inspiration, poetry and practical tips from surfers, swimmers, illustrators and poets.

As well as this we have chosen to donate proceeds from each sale to The Wave Project. The Wave Project is a national surf therapy charity that works with young people to improve their mental and emotional wellbeing.  The charity began life on a single beach in Cornwall ten years ago and now works with children across the UK.

Here’s to riding the waves together and finding your FLOW.

Specification:

  • Our Infamous Grip, Naturally. It wouldn't be Yogi Bare without it.

  • Smooth but anti slip PU top + 100% natural and sustainable rubber base.

  • Dimensions: 180cm x 66cm - slightly longer and wider than your average yoga mat giving you more room to play. 

  • A 4mm thickness provides a stable yet supportive surface to protect your joints. 

  • Weight 2.5kg.

entry.title: Lunar Paws - Natural rubber extreme grip yoga mat - Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Mat
Price: 104.95

Lunar Paws is our love letter to the Ocean, the moon and all that we are. Just as the moon moves through cycles and the ocean moves through waves, we created Lunar Paws to be there to support you; whatever your cycle, whatever your wave, however you move. We believe that everything you need is already within you. 

Etched into the mat are tiny mountains and hidden symbols waiting to be discovered through your practice.  Inhale. Exhale. Come back to me.

Please allow an extra 2-3 days for delivery.

Specification

  • Our Infamous Grip, Naturally. It wouldn't be Yogi Bare without it.

  • Crafted from sustainable rubber, the Yogi Bare Lunar Paws offers the optimal high performance yoga mat experience, no matter what waves life sends your way. 

  • Dimensions: 180cm x 66cm - slightly longer and wider than your average yoga mat giving you more room to play. 

  • A 4mm thickness provides a stable yet supportive surface to protect your joints. 

  • Weight 2.5kg. 

  • With The Moon As Your Guide. Create your own flow.

entry.title: Paws - Natural rubber extreme grip yoga mat - Red
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Mat
Price: 104.95

GRIP LIKE NEVER BEFORE! Say Goodbye to being a Grizzly Yogi Bare and allow us to introduce the Yogi Bare PAWS mat for the grip of your life. Crafted from eco friendly natural rubber you won’t be able to keep your paws off of it.

Can’t wait to get your PAWS on one?

Specifications

  • Materials: Natural Rubber and PU

  • Dimensions: 180cm x 66cm

  • Thickness (for Savasana!) : 4mm

  • Weight 2.5 Kg

  • Non slip technology

entry.title: Wild Paws - Natural rubber extreme grip yoga mat - Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Mat
Price: 104.95

Life's an adventure and we want to be there with you for the journey. Made from eco friendly natural rubber for the grip of your life, things just got a whole lot more earth friendly. Sweat it out baby - Our grip's got you even if you're dripping, we're gripping.

EACH MAT SOLD = 1 TREE PLANTED WITH HOMETREE.

Specification

  • Dimensions: 180cm x 66cm - slightly longer and wider than your average yoga mat giving you more room to play.

  • A 4mm thickness provides a stable yet supportive surface to protect your joints.

  • Weight 2.5kg

  • Materials: Natural Rubber and PU

  • Non slip technology
